docs.lead_paragraph: The American public will find out if its political leaders are up the dual task of preserving the recovery and putting the budget on a sustainable long-term path.
docs.abstract: Editorial identifies several key areas of the upcoming debate over the tax increases and spending cuts slated to take effect in 2013; contends that the way in which political leaders address these issues will allow Americans to see whether they are up to the dual task of preserving the recovery and putting the budget on a sustainable long-term path.
docs.snippet: The American public will find out if its political leaders are up the dual task of preserving the recovery and putting the budget on a sustainable long-term path.
